organizeEvent.title: Want to organize an event?
organizeEvent.description: Got an idea for a fun House Event or Gambit? Create your own activity and earn bonus points for your house!
organizeEvent.whatsappInfo: Message your house captain or post in the group chat to propose an event.
benefits: Earn bonus points for your house
Events can be as simple as a movie night or board game session
